'''Cocouik''', or '''Coco'''<ref name="VWMM">{{Ref/Quest|Vaulting the Wall of Morning Mist}}</ref>, is a quest-exclusive [[NPC]] that appears in the {{Quest|Lost Traveler in the Ashen Realm}}.

It is a small "dragonspirit" that was once [[Bona]]'s companion.<ref name="NNN">{{Ref/Item|A Nameless Adventurer's Notes}}</ref> It is later revealed to be the "mind" of [[Och-Kan]], which he separated from his "spirit and body" to protect the people of [[Ochkanatlan]]<ref>{{Ref/Quest|Moment of Awakening}}</ref> from within the [[Core of Chu'ulel]].<ref name="NNN" /> In ''[[Moment of Awakening]]'', "Cocouik" merged with his old body and faced the [[Traveler]] in one final battle.

Cocouik later reappeared with Bona to assist the Traveler in combat in the Night Kingdom.<ref>{{Ref/Quest|Journey of Stars and Flames}}</ref>
